concept.title: About this document
concept.shortdesc: The presented information describes how to use a variety of services for cryptography and data-security provided in the ().

conbody.p:
The services perform cryptographic operations using the following adapters in coprocessor mode:
Crypto Express7 (CEX7C), Feature Code 0898 or 0899
Crypto Express6 (CEX6C), Feature Code 0893
Crypto Express5 (CEX5C), Feature Code 0890
Crypto Express4 (CEX4C), Feature Code 0865 See for details.
This publication is for planning and programming purposes only.
The host software provides an application programming interface through which applications request secure, high-speed cryptographic services from the hardware cryptographic features.

Applications linked with prior host software will continue to function if the host software is upgraded in place. However, always recommends full testing of upgrades before implementing production roll-out.
